title: Zero-waste challenge
content: Create no waste for one day (no single-use plastics). Take a picture of your packed lunch or reusable items.

title: Local transport day
content: Use public transit, walk, or cycle for all short trips. Upload a photo of your route or bike.

title: Plant or tend a plant
content: Plant a seed or care for a houseplant and show progress with a photo proof.

title: Community clean-up
content: Spend at least 30 minutes cleaning up a local area. Show your results with a photo.

title: Host a Local Recycling Drive
content: Organize or coordinate a small recycling collection (paper, batteries, e-waste) and document the results.

title: Reduce Energy Use
content: Make a measurable change to reduce energy consumption (set displays to sleep, unplug unused devices, use power strips) and report what you changed.

title: Sustainable Code Contribution
content: Make a code change that reduces waste (improve performance, add tests to reduce rework, or simplify a build) and explain how it helps sustainability.

title: Green Outreach
content: Share a short post or mini-presentation to your team/class about a sustainability idea (recycling, commuting, energy saving).

title: Zero-waste Lunch
content: Bring a zero-waste lunch (reusable containers, no disposables) and describe how you did it.
